content: Is there an open source code snippet that renders a StructureDefinition XML file into a HTML file? Preferably a tree structure. I'm about to write one but wondered if I should re-invent the wheel. Thanks

Well, we have the code that we use to generate the various HTML views in the spec. We don't have anything that runs that code independently though you could rig up the IG publisher tool to spit out those bits without too much overhead
Class ProfileUtilities in the FHIR svn, or as packaged in the validator or the IG publisher
You'll have to load a bunch of content out of the file igpack.zip to generate the tree with correct links
